introduction_id: Sistem Kontrol Terpadu adalah produk untuk kontrol terpusat peralatan inspeksi lajur. Peralatan ini dapat menghubungkan kontrol sensor tanah, lampu lalu lintas, sistem anti-tabrakan interaktif, sistem anti-bobol, gerbang pembatas, kolom pengangkat, dan peralatan lainnya di lajur. Sistem ini memiliki fungsi seperti kendali jarak jauh, inspeksi mandiri peralatan akses terminal, peningkatan daring, dll., dan dapat mencapai kontrol lajur yang efisien dalam satu mesin serta memastikan inspeksi yang aman dan tertib. Sistem ini cocok untuk lokasi seperti pos pemeriksaan di kampus, pelabuhan, bandara, dan berbagai area pengawasan khusus.
features_en: Able to Function in High Temperature Environment
description_en: The Integrated Control System is a product for centralized control of lane inspection equipment. The equipment can linkage control the ground sensing, traffic guidance lights, interactive anti-smashing system, anti-break-in system, barrier gates, lifting column and other equipment in the lane. It has functions such as remote control, terminal access equipment self-inspection, online upgrades, etc., and it can achieve the efficient lane control on one machine and ensure safe and orderly inspection. It is suitable for scenes such as checkpoints in campuses, ports, airports, andvarious special supervision areas.
introduction_en: The Integrated Control System is a product for centralized control of lane inspection equipment. The equipment can linkage control the ground sensing, traffic guidance lights, interactive anti-smashing system, anti-break-in system, barrier gates, lifting column and other equipment in the lane. It has functions such as remote control, terminal access equipment self-inspection, online upgrades, etc., and it can achieve the efficient lane control on one machine and ensure safe and orderly inspection. It is suitable for scenes such as checkpoints in campuses, ports, airports, andvarious special supervision areas.

parameter_id.label: Material Perangkat
parameter_id.value: Material utama: SPCC, dengan lapisan bubuk permukaan

parameter_id.label: Peralatan Kontrol Linkage
parameter_id.value: 1. Kontrol penghalang ganda di pintu masuk lajur 2. Sistem pengaman penghalang masuk 3. Sistem pemisah kendaraan di pintu masuk 4. Kontrol penghalang ganda  di pintu keluar lajur 5. Sistem pengaman penghalang keluar 6. Sistem pemisah kendaraan di pintu keluar 7. Lampu pemandu lalu lintas di pintu masuk lajur 8. Lampu pemandu lalu lintas  di pintu keluar lajur 9. Lampu indikator lalu lintas di atas kepala 10. Deteksi kendaraan loop induktif 11. Kontrol anti-tailgating

features_id: Mampu Berfungsi di Lingkungan Bersuhu Tinggi
description_id: Sistem Kontrol Terpadu adalah produk untuk kontrol terpusat peralatan inspeksi lajur. Peralatan ini dapat menghubungkan kontrol sensor tanah, lampu lalu lintas, sistem anti-tabrakan interaktif, sistem anti-bobol, gerbang pembatas, kolom pengangkat, dan peralatan lainnya di lajur. Sistem ini memiliki fungsi seperti kendali jarak jauh, inspeksi mandiri peralatan akses terminal, peningkatan daring, dll., dan dapat mencapai kontrol lajur yang efisien dalam satu mesin serta memastikan inspeksi yang aman dan tertib. parameter_en.label: Device Material
parameter_en.value: Main material: SPCC, with surface powder coating

parameter_en.label: Linkage Control Equipment
parameter_en.value: 1. Dual-barrier control at lane entrance 2. Entrance barrier safety system 3. Entrance vehicle separation system 4. Dual-barrier control  at lane exit 5. Exit barrier safety system 6. Exit vehicle separation system 7. Traffic guidance lights at lane entrance 8. Traffic guidance  lights at lane exit 9. Overhead traffic indicator lights 10. Inductive loop vehicle detection 11. Anti-tailgating control
